author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police on Saturday arrested a youth in connection with a series of chain snatching incidents and recovered three sovereigns of jewellery and a two-wheeler from him.

A team of policemen was conducting vehicle checks at Lally Tollendal-Francois Martin street junction when they intercepted one Anbu alias Anbalagan of Mettupalayam who was riding a two-wheeler without a registration plate.

Preliminary investigations revealed that the vehicle was stolen by the accused from Nidarajapayer Street. Anbalagan was also involved in chain snatching incidents in Puducherry and Tindivanam. The police recovered three sovereigns of jewellery and the bike from him. He was produced before a local court and remanded to custody.
title: Youth held for snatching gold chains
